Well, since a wile i decided to start my own server. With great enthousiasm i startet to add stuff and edit things. Now..., i ran out of inspiration... (AlReAdY? , yes -,-')
[size=11pt][u][b]Suggestions:[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li]- minigames[/li] [li]- full special[/li] [li]- right click duel[/li] [li]-[/li] [li]-[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]-[/li] [li]-[/li] [li]-[/li] [li]-[/li] [li]-[/li][/ul]
--------------------------------------------------
Well, i'll try to add them as soon as possible
my server: undertaxscape.no-ip.org : 43594 my name: undertaxxx
____________________________________________
btw: i'm lazy.. don't expect me to add everything in like 24h =P
grtzz

item.title: °●°● Project-Undertax ●°●°© Needs suggestions!
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

i got hard training… and i’ll try to add some duel sh!t =D

uhm

rares are pretty hard to get i guess =)

and full specials… i wanted to add that, but i cant find any TuT for it… you guys got a link?

Read full topic

item.title: °●°● Project-Undertax ●°●°© Needs suggestions!
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

0wnz0r:

Hard training. Not everyone is maxed out…

Not alot of people like hard training, there are seriously some servers out there that expect you to go to level 99 in all stats while getting like 100xp per hit…(pking servers). i like it better like i have it in my server, “master2”. everyone does it, no lag due to people massing on dummies, meaning perfect pk with no lag, but there are the massers who mass pk, but you can fix that with an increase in the actionTimers and thats all.

And to me this thread just seems like a way to advertise your server to other people, so people can go on, thus not using the “status page”. personally i don’t think he has the coding abilities to do all this, but hey i could be wrong?

If that isn’t the case, try making some skills working, like it was stated above, but i don’t advise, i wouldn’t like to be on a server cooking fish n shit. its pointless, if you wanna do that, go play rs2.

Read full topic

item.description:

Add working skills and if you dont have it already where you right click on someone and click duel and it teles you to duel arena like normal RS my server has that

item.title: °●°● Project-Undertax ●°●°© Needs suggestions!
item.dc:creator: @Illegal_Socks Illegal Socks
item.description:
@Illegal_Socks wrote:

I got a few suggestions here they are: moving fire capes, skill capes, max stats 99 and max cb 126, working specs, alot of skills working! Also make rares harder to get! You don’t have to put all these in but atleast get 1 or 2 in ;D

item.dc:creator: @foolio foolio
item.description:
@foolio wrote:

heres an idea add some neww global objects… example like on my server i made a altar and instead of prayer i made it craft money :)… and replace the water fountain in varrok with a magic tree… make it receive magic logs then you can change shop price for the logs for like 250k ea…
